elements.label: Mild Alarm
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 1</color></size>

Some whispers have reached them. They don’t know what they don’t know, but they know there is something to know.

elements.label: Fierce alarm
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 2</color></size>

People who despise getting attention know someone is paying them attention. They will start paying attention back.

elements.label: Gathered Forces
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 3</color></size>

They have called in reinforcements. They are ready for us.

elements.label: Full Lock-Down
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 4</color></size>

All doors are locked, all eyes are open.
